children.name: background_image
children.description: A banner background image that is related to a conference the company is having.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading about the conference the company is having.

children.name: subheading

children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take which is buying tickets to the conference.

children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take which is buying tickets to the conference.
